article_title: Rhema set to flip switch to start Christmas Lights Extravaganza
article_text:
Lights on 6 p.m. Wednesday.

More than 2 million lights on display 5:30-11:30 p.m. nightly through New Year's Day

Rhema campus, 1025 W. Kenosha St. - 71st Street (Kenosha) between 145th (Aspen) and 161st (Elm) Streets.

Carriage Rides, Thursday-Saturday and Dec. 4-5, 11-12 and 18-25. $10 for Adults; $5 for each child; family pack for two adults and six kids under age 12, $25.

Admission is free. Donations will be accepted.

og.description: The Bible college in Broken Arrow will turn on more than 2 million lights at 6 p.m. Wednesday.
